JobFullDesc: Government & Public Services - State and Local  Operations Transformation  DC Metro Area Are you interested in working with dedicated government consulting professionals in Deloitte's Government & Public Services practice and collaborating with federal government officials to support transformational change? We understand federal government clients and the issues they face, and have a track record of experienced practitioners bringing proven methodologies to bring lasting impact. Our multidisciplinary approach incorporates a suite of technology tools and accelerators, frameworks, and practitioners with broad backgrounds and experience to bring results to our client.  Work you'll do  Consultants in Deloitte's Government & Public Services practice with a focus on Federal, State, and Local Government Consulting serve as trusted advisors to most of the government agencies in both Washington, DC and around the country. Whether its program and performance optimization, program and policy strategy, technology integration, organizational and change transformation, program management, or data analysis- Deloitte is uniquely qualified to tackle today's most pressing federal government challenges. Deloitte Consulting's growing Government & Public Services practice is seeking individuals with experience in government consulting with a focus on program management to join our team.  The team  Operations Transformation Our Operations Transformation team focuses on transforming our clients' core business operations. We advise, design, implement, and deploy solutions focused on "heart of the business" issues across federal, state, and local government organizations. The type of work we provide to our clients includes:  Operations Excellence: focused on helping organizations deliver critical program by enabling them to make better business decisions on the cost, schedule, performance, and risk of their programs.  Emerging Business Models: focused on providing government leaders with the capabilities and tools to build flexible, innovative business models that create and capture value for the organization Our clients seek a fresh perspective on how to create a flexible, innovative business model supported by a strong operations foundation. Professionals will use their deep sector knowledge and program management skills to work alongside our federal clients to bring best practices and manage their most important initiatives and projects.  Qualifications:   2 + years' experience, supporting a PMO, preferably coming from consulting or supporting State and Local governments  Bachelor's Degree from accredited College or University  Preferred Qualifications:  Active Government Security Clearance - Secret or above  Deep expertise in at least one PM area: schedule, risk, performance reporting, requirements development, or portfolio management  Program and project management experience with State, Local, or Federal clients  Experience assisting clients deliver key programs  Experience with SharePoint or ServiceNow and digital reporting technologies  PMP or similar certification  The ability to work independently or within small teams focused on specific work streams of larger projects  Strong oral and written communication skills, including presentation skills  Working with requirements and translating them into actionable deliverables  Strong problem solving and troubleshooting skills with the ability to exercise mature judgment  Trending, forecasting, or predictive modeling  Experience with presentation and data analysis/ analytics software, including MS Visio, MS PowerPoint, Excel, Access, R, SAS, Tableau, QlikView, QlikSense, Perceptive or others  Experience with digital strategy/technology  *Must be legally authorized to work in the United States without the need for employer sponsorship, now or at any time in the future
